## isExtant() function

Determine whether an argument is neither null, nor undefined

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
declare function isExtant<T>(testValue: T | null | undefined): testValue is T;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  testValue | T \| null \| undefined | a value to test |

<b>Returns:</b>

testValue is T
